ygData.subject: Re: bronze weapons
ygData.msgSnippet: ... From: Magik  To: eqenchanters@onelist.com  Date: Wednesday, April 21, 1999 3:39 PM Subject: [eqenchanters]
ygData.messageBody:
-----Original Message-----
From: Magik <aarongb@...>
To: eqenchanters@onelist.com <eqenchanters@onelist.com>
Date: Wednesday, April 21, 1999 3:39 PM
Subject: [eqenchanters] Re: bronze weapons


>From: "Magik" <aarongb@...>
>
>NO!!!......and if youd REALLY like a good weapon to use as a staff......go
>get a Fine Steel Staff.....I have one and they are WONDERFUL!!!!......
>
>
Well, I'd personally recommend trying to keep up both your piercing at 2h
blunt. The best weapon's you'll be finding for quite a while will be 2H
blunt (rune totem staff), but there are some really, really nice piercing
weapons later on. Of course, by the time you can get these, it's quite
possible that you'll have completely given up on melee, so I guess it's all
a matter of personal taste. =)

Cheers,
Jude Morrigan
